Module net.tangly.fsm
Package net.tangly.fsm.dsl

Interface FsmBuilder<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>

Type Parameters:
O - the class of the instance owning the finite state machine instance
S - enumeration type for the identifiers of states
E - enumeration type for the identifiers of events
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefinitionBuilder
public interface FsmBuilder<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>
Domain specific language fluent interface to build a state machine declaration starting with a state. This interface provides the entry point to select a state or add a substate to a selected state.

  • Method Details

    • of

      static <O, S extends Enum<S>, E extends Enum<E>> FsmBuilder<O,S,E> of(S rootId)
      Builder method to create a new finite state machine builder.
      Type Parameters:
      O - the class of the instance owning the finite state machine instance
      S - enumeration type for the identifiers of states
      E - enumeration type for the identifiers of events
      Parameters:
      rootId - the identifier of the root state of the finite state machine to build
      Returns:
      the newly build finite state machine builder

    • in

      StateBuilder<O,S,E> in(S stateId)
      Selects the state with the given identifier and returns a state builder.
      Parameters:
      stateId - identifier of the requested existing state
      Returns:
      the requested state builder

    • root

      Selects the root state of the machine and returns a state builder.
      Returns:
      the requested root state builder

    • definition

      State<O,S,E> definition()
      Returns the root state of the finite state machine definition and terminate the building process.
      Returns:
      the root state of the definition

    • machine

      StateMachine<O,S,E> machine(String name, O owner)
      Creates an instance of the state machine based on the definition of the state machine available to the builder.
      Parameters:
      name - human readable name of the finite state machine instance
      owner - instance owning the finite state machine
      Returns:
      the state machine instance
